com.bbn.openmap
Interface SoloMapComponent

All Known Implementing Classes:
BeanBoxDnDCatcher, BufferedLayer.BLMapBean, BufferedLayerMapBean, BufferedMapBean, DropListenerSupport, HintsMapBeanRepaintPolicy, LayerHandler, MapBean, MouseDelegator, PropertyHandler, StandardMapBeanRepaintPolicy
public interface SoloMapComponent

This interface is simply a way to mark a class as something that should only exist once within a MapHandler. When map components are added to the MapHandler, the MapHandler will check to see if 1) the component is a SoloMapComponent, and 2) if it is, depending on the policy set in the MapHandler, that no other classes of the same type are already added to the BeanContext.
